home.desc: An experienced developer with a passion for crafting elegant solutions and engaging experiences.

about.title: Who I am
about.desc: I've been immersed in the world of software development since I was young, constantly sharpening my skills and adapting with the ever-changing industry. I'm hooked on the dynamic nature of this field and I love tackling the challenges that come with each new advancement. As a Senior Software Developer at Millipede, I have worked alongside some of the biggest names in the global tech scene. It's given me invaluable insights into large-scale software development projects and the opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge solutions.

items.title: Games
items.desc: I am well-versed in game development, using Unity3D, C#, or JavaScript libraries to create immersive experiences with captivating mechanics. You may have experienced some of my work in the award winning Agent A: A Puzzle In Disguise.

items.title: Mobile
items.desc: With profieiency in both native and modern hybrid approaches to mobile development, I have produced innumerable applications with sleek and responsive designs. I am experienced with Android and iOS SDKs, and I've recently picked up React Native. Most recently, I lead development of the Movember mobile application which saw $32 million in donations flow through app users in four weeks.

items.title: Web
items.desc: I have experience with a wide range of web technologies, including the latest in HTML, CSS and JavaScript/Typescript.
